title: S*ave Harem in the Labyrinth of the Other World (WN) - Novel Updates

tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Breast Fetish   Cheats   Cooking   Demi-Humans   Dragons   Dungeons   Dwarfs   Elemental Magic   Elves   Fallen Nobility   Fantasy World   First-time Interc**rse   Game Elements   Guilds   Heroes   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Level System   Maids   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Monsters   Nobles   Perverted Protagonist   Polygamy   R-18   S*x S*aves   S*ave Harem   S*aves   Special Abilities   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transported to Another World   Tsundere

description: A man was about to commit suicide and decided to search for a way to die on the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills for a character. He took interest in it, and when he was done setting his character, he was asked, “You will now be transported to a world with the settings you chose. Coming back is not possible. Do you still accept?” Without thinking much of it, he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills he chose to have.>
